Yall please pray for me. I just went to a Missions Conferance for my church and io think God wants me to be a missionary to Egypt. The only problem is I already had my life planned out. i was gonna go to college, then I was gonna go to the air force and later become a polotician. I have to follow Gods will for my life. Every time they said something about how the young folks were gonna go to the mission feild i felt this thing inside me and it made me wanna cry (sometimes I did). Pray that God will help me be strong in my commitment ok. 
 
 
 P.S. If your just gonna make fun of me or put me down then don't bother posting. emoticon_rolleyes
i think that is awesome that you are going to go to egypt to be a missionary. its a huge risk that most people would not be willing to take. good luck:)
What would you do...as a missionary?
Egypt? Muslims are hard to change... good luck, maybe you'll do it.
I wont pray for you, I think it's a waste of time, but I'll wish you success in whatever you choose, except if it is forcing your beliefs on other cultures.

You go girl! :) Follow God's will for your life, wherever it might take you. Here are some verses for you to read if you ever get discouraged:
 
 Matthew 5:14-15
 "You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden. Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, and it gives light to everyone in the house."
 
 John 1:5
 The light shines in the darkness, but the darkness has not understood (overcome) it.
 
 
 
 (I have many more, but I don't have my Bible with me so I'm using one of those "online Bible" things.) I'll be prayin' for ya! ;)
It takes a brave person to go into that environment to win some souls to Christ. I'll pray for you. :)

A tragic case of a perfectly good debater throwing her life away :)
 Good luck in all you do, be a good face for christians (god knows they need some).

Thanks yall! Oh to answer your question tuesdeb, missionarys go to foriegn countries and tell people about Christ. And dsadevil Im guessing that was half compliment. Calligirl thanxs for the verses. Jon, thanxs and i know its going to be extemely scary. im going to teach children. And if I EVER find a husband that would be willing to go, I hope he'll teach adults. this really does help encourage me. Thank You!:) :) :) Thanxs Brokerfor praying for me.

debategirl,
 
 I dont want to make you smile less...I asked the question, because when I read your original post, I pictured indiginous cultures being destroyed by arrogant people who think their way is the only way. I hope you arent included in this mob...not that the Egyptian culture is in any danger of being destroyed at this point. 
 
 Anyhoo...good luck at finding your "mission" in this life! :D
im not seeking out to "destroy" a culture I just want to help children who want to be helped.

OK OK , God bless American and God bless you too!
 
 emoticon_rolleyes
It sounds like your church wants you to go do missionary work, not god.
No, I made a decision at the age of 10. I just haven't been wanting to do it. Now, I relize that thats what God wants me to do.

Debategirl,
 I think it's great that you want to do what God wants you to. Remember, if you stay in his will for your life, you'll always be fine.

Thinking you know God's will is to exclude everyone on the planet who doesnt accept the Christian beliefs is dilusional. If you want to do something to help others then do it! Why do you have to qualify it? By the way...most people have a faith already and find it offensive to be prostletised to.

[QUOTE]Originally posted by tuesdeb 
 [B]Thinking you know God's will is to exclude everyone on the planet who doesnt accept the Christian beliefs is dilusional. 
 
 
 How does that exclude everyone on the planet who does not belief in God? It doesn't, it is just a way unbelievers say Christians are mean and cruel and think there better than everyone else. That is not true. That is peoples opinion.

Are you saying that Christians don't preach that anyone who doesn't believe that Jesus "died for our sins" and is the messiah, then that person will go to hell? Do you deny that it means all the Jews, Muslims, Traditional Native American religions, Buddists, Bahai, Hindus, Agnostics, etc, etc, etc arent good enough for your perception of God? According to all I have learned the basic christian belief is this: on the "day of the lord" (rapture), Jesus will return to earth and take all "his people" to heaven (dead and alive) to be with god. those "left behind" (please dont get me started on that book!) will have to live in wars and famines...and in some Christian sects, there will be a chance for redemption, but only if the belief in Jesus replaces your current one. I could be wrong, but that sounds like an exclusive club...one you have to give up your own faith to join. NO THANKS!!

Good luck Debategirl! And like Dsa said, "be a good face for christians". And help those less fortunate then you, if you find them, no matter what they believe. I've heard stories of missionaries witholding food and stuff until people convert, so don't be like them. 
 And also good luck finding a husband who'll go too. ;)

I think you should do it but maybe you can combine what you want with what God wants you know do the mission thing come back do the thing u wanna do. And Monkey praying is not useless if u have faith...from what it seems uve lost it. (the faith not your mind):)
Just remeber when you die all this will seem so breif and you'll be sooo happy with God.
